# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a text field cell from data in the provided unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An unarchiver object.

## Return Value

A text field cell that displays a string.

## Creating a Text Field Cell

- **init(textCell:)**: Initializes a text field cell that displays the specified string.
